description:
A man gets a hood which helps him listen to animals. An old man`s wife beloved makes him promise to put her dead body in the closet.  Vegetables take a bath to get ready to go to heaven.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kikimimi Zukin / Jiisan Orukai / Ninjin to Gobou to Daikon
The Listening Hood / You There, Grandpa? / The Carrot, the Burdock, and the Radish
聴き耳頭巾 / 爺さんおるかい / 人参と牛蒡と大根
